search.name: DuckDuckGo
search.description:
DuckDuckGo is a general purpose search engine like Google or Bing.
Get way more instant answers: zero-click info above the links (red box).
Less spam and clutter: we ban those useless sites with just ads.
Lots and lots of goodies: special searches (tech), syntax & settings.
Real privacy: we don't track you!
